content.raw:
I just tested the imu on a ball that falls onto a ramp and rolls. While rolling, the orientation and angular_velocity update. However, the linear_acceleration is always zeros, whether falling or rolling.

I'm going to file this as a bug with GetLinearAcceleration, since the imu code looks good.
content.html:
I just tested the imu on a ball that falls onto a ramp and rolls. While rolling, the orientation and angular_velocity update. However, the linear_acceleration is always zeros, whether falling or rolling.

I'm going to file this as a bug with GetLinearAcceleration, since the imu code looks good.
